DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim propose project conduct randomize control trial evaluate efficacy digital intervention tool enable young people correspond trained staff via online chat text message urgent question relate sexual/reproductive health .
DOC.detailed_description: The present evaluation study engage digital technology target young people impact use sexual health service . The primary aim propose project conduct randomize control trial evaluate efficacy intervention tool enable young people correspond trained staff via online chat text message urgent question relate sexual/reproductive health . Specifically , Chat/Text program design provide immediate answer urgent sexual reproductive health question reliable confidential source link young people sexual reproductive health service . Agents train substantive topic , respond compassionately appropriately . They provide scripted response specific topic . Agent performance monitor evaluated ensure high-quality response meet goal program . The program target group experience sexual reproductive health disparity , particularly Black Latino/Hispanic teens young adult . The Chat/Text program launch September 2010 Planned Parenthood Federation America ( PPFA ) . The present project evaluate efficacy Chat/Text program . Specifically , investigator compare effect Chat/Text program standard care available PPFA ( website content ) absence Chat/Text program . Participants randomize one three arm evaluative study ( experimental , control , passive control ) . Participants experimental arm receive access digital Chat/Text program ask question receive answer sexual reproductive health issue real-time , immediately follow combined baseline follow-up assessment . Participants control arm study rout Planned Parenthood website content information sexual reproductive health issue , also follow combined assessment . Participants passive control receive standalone baseline assessment rout website . No additional contact make passive control group . The experimental participant receive booster session form e-mail SMS communication . The first ( 5 day post-intervention ) second ( 3 week post-intervention ) booster session focus appointment adherence . The third ( 2 month post-intervention ) fourth ( 2.5 month post-intervention ) booster session focus effective birth control method addition appointment adherence . The control condition receive booster session , receive communication aim obtain additional tracking information . These track communication send time point experimental booster session ( i.e. , 5 days- , 3 weeks- , 2 months- , 2.5 months-post website exposure ) .
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 1525 Had sex within past 30 day prior enrollment Never use Planned Parenthood Chat/Text program Males Females outside age 1525 Female report sex past 30 day Have use Planned Parenthood Chat/Text program
